actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5051 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (relating to the Federal excise tax on beer).

summary.text: Imposes a tax on all beer brewed or produced, and removed for consumption or sale, within the United States, or imported into the United States. Establishes a rate of tax of nine dollars for every barrel containing not more than thirty-one gallons and at a like rate for any other quantity or for fractional parts of a barrel. Reduces the rate of taxation for specified domestic production of beer.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5051 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (relating to the Federal excise tax on beer).
